title: LF Flex partner to duo with. B-S
body: Hey guys, im looking for someone to join my climb, been playing since season one so have really good game knowledge and skill, started my flex as bronze 5 3 days ago and 50lp ish B3 now so looking for someone committed to the climb :) add me BrySkuxx

replies.body:
Hey man, would be happy to play with you, i just added you. This is my smurf account so, im looking to have a good time while still remaining on the climb.
If you want to play just give us an add

I'd be keen.

Been playing for about 3 years now and have only recently got back into ranked after at least a season away to work on my game skills.

KDA is ok I guess, but it is my map awareness and clutch plays that I find to be most useful in any game I play.

Biggest annoyances;

ADC that won't just hug tower and farm up when behind (get caught out in jungle or forget to wave clear minions waves in our lanes)

MID assassins that go all in even in fights a potato would know they can't win
